content.question: The Todai-ji temple complex demonstrates continuity with other works of imperial Buddhist architecture from Asia because it was

choices.label: constructed with a large stone stupa for pilgrims to circumambulate
constructed on a monumental scale to express royal authority
built in a remote location to provide solace for the monks who lived there
built with large dry gardens used for quiet reflection and meditation

content.answer: constructed on a monumental scale to express royal authority
